summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of $120.00 from the Water Fund to be paid O. W. Peterson as a refund of assessment paid by him against lots eight (8) and nine (9), block twenty-three (23) replat of North Seattle by D. T. Denny, Local Improvement District No. 1017, and repealing Ordinance No. 13465, entitled "An Ordinance appropriating money out of the Water Fund to pay certain refund assessments to the owners of property included in Local Improvement District No. 1017.
